Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a doctored image with manipulated placards.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photo shows Indian police officers protesting against the citizenship bill and citizenship register, which may not be accurate due to the doctored nature of the image.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the image, as it actually shows police personnel protesting against an assault on their colleagues by lawyers.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the image has been manipulated and does not accurately represent the actual protest.
Falters at times: The claim falters by presenting a misleading image and misrepresenting the context of the protest.
Exaggerate: There is no evidence of exaggeration in the claim.
Understate: There is no evidence of understating in the claim.
